scripts.smoke:engine-next-nav: mkdir -p .tmp-smoke && tsc --outDir .tmp-smoke --module commonjs --moduleResolution node --target ES2022 --lib ES2022,DOM --strict scripts/engine-next-navigation-smoke.ts && node -e "require('fs').writeFileSync('.tmp-smoke/package.json', '{\"type\":\"commonjs\"}')" && node .tmp-smoke/scripts/engine-next-navigation-smoke.js && rm -rf .tmp-smoke
